entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Strathroy
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:56 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 08:15 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -3.2°C
Wind: ENE 24 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Overcast. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Overcast. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023
